description: Smartwool teamed with Kate Zessel to create this iconic mountain escape pattern to wrap your foot in style. Whether you’re cutting first tracks or coming in for aprs-ski, this sock will ensure your comfort all day. Built with Indestructawool™ technology to improve durability, this sock also features some of our best attributes: the 4 Degree™ elite fit system for perfect fit, Shred Shield™ technology with a reinforced toe cap, and body-mapped mesh zones for breathability.
name: Smartwool Performance Ski Zero Cushion Mountain Escape Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens
